user.title: Sign in to Repsol Vivit
user.description: Enter your Repsol Vivit (formerly Repsol Luz y Gas) account credentials to link your account with Home Assistant.

contract.title: Select Contract
contract.description: Select the contract you want to integrate. Each contract will be configured as a separate entry.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Repsol Vivit servers. Check your internet connection or try again later.
error.no_contracts: No contracts found for this account.
error.already_configured: This contract is already configured. Please select another one.
error.login_failed: Failed to log in with the provided credentials. Please check your username and password and try again.
error.invalid_contracts_data: Error retrieving contract data. Please check your connection or the Repsol API.
error.invalid_contract_selection: Invalid contract selection. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This contract has already been configured and cannot be added again.

init.title: Repsol Vivit + Home Assistant Integration Options
init.description: Configure additional options for the Repsol Vivit integration.
